en-US.desktop-to-mobile-subtitle: Scan the QR code to download Firefox for mobile. Once installed, select “Sync to mobile” to access your passwords, bookmarks, and more on the go.

de.desktop-to-mobile-subtitle: Scanne den QR-Code, um Firefox fürs Handy herunterzuladen. Wähle nach der Installation „Mit Handy synchronisieren“, um unterwegs auf Passwörter, Lesezeichen und mehr zuzugreifen.

en-CA.desktop-to-mobile-subtitle: Scan the QR code to download Firefox for mobile. Once installed, select “Sync to mobile” to access your passwords, bookmarks, and more on the go.

en-GB.desktop-to-mobile-subtitle: Scan the QR code to download Firefox for mobile. Once installed, select “Sync to mobile” to access your passwords, bookmarks, and more on the go.
